title: Iran Begins The Purge After Hamas Chief's Assassination In Tehran
content: In response to the killing of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in its capital Tehran, Iran has arrested over two dozen individuals, including high-ranking intelligence officers, military officials, and staff at a military-run guesthouse in the capital.
summary: In response to the killing of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in its capital Tehran, Iran has arrested over two dozen individuals, including high-ranking intelligence officers, military officials, and staff at a military-run guesthouse in the capital.

title: McDonald's Worker Sets Restaurant On Fire Over Customer Frustration
content: Authorities emphasized the severity of arson and its risks to public safety, crediting the collaboration of local and federal agencies for McGregor's prosecution.
summary: Authorities emphasized the severity of arson and its risks to public safety, crediting the collaboration of local and federal agencies for McGregor's prosecution.

title: Turkey's Viral Olympian Took Up Shooting After Divorce? A Fact-check
content: Turkish shooter Yusuf Dikec, who won a silver medal at the Paris Olympics 2024 in the 10m air pistol competition, became a viral sensation for his "gearless" look.
summary: Turkish shooter Yusuf Dikec, who won a silver medal at the Paris Olympics 2024 in the 10m air pistol competition, became a viral sensation for his "gearless" look.

title: Donald Trump Agrees To Debate Kamala Harris On September 4
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said late Friday he had agreed with Fox News to debate Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris on September 4.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said late Friday he had agreed with Fox News to debate Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris on September 4.

title: Donald Trump Attacks Kamala Harris' Black-Indian Identity As Polls Near
content: With the US Presidential election in its last stretch, Donald Trump and Kamala Harris are leaving no stone turned to win voters.
summary: With the US Presidential election in its last stretch, Donald Trump and Kamala Harris are leaving no stone turned to win voters.

title: Russian Spy Couple Return From US, Children Don't Recognize Putin
content: Their parents were posing as an Argentine couple in Slovenia and were later convicted of spying. The two children accompanied them to Moscow on Thursday from Turkey
summary: Their parents were posing as an Argentine couple in Slovenia and were later convicted of spying. The two children accompanied them to Moscow on Thursday from Turkey

title: Middle East Alert For Indians As Iran-Israel Tensions Escalate
content: Tensions have escalated in the Middle East after Iran and the groups it supports vowed revenge for the killing of top Hamas and Hezbollah leaders.
summary: Tensions have escalated in the Middle East after Iran and the groups it supports vowed revenge for the killing of top Hamas and Hezbollah leaders.

title: 2 Iran Agents, Bombs In 3 Rooms: Inside Mossad's Kill Op For Hamas Chief
content: Israel's elite intelligence agency Mossad enlisted Iranian security agents to plant explosives in a building in Tehran where armed Palestinian group Hamas's political leader Ismail Haniyeh was staying, The Telegraph reported.
summary: Israel's elite intelligence agency Mossad enlisted Iranian security agents to plant explosives in a building in Tehran where armed Palestinian group Hamas's political leader Ismail Haniyeh was staying, The Telegraph reported.

title: Why Philosophy Is Crucial In The Age Of Artificial Intelligence
content: OpenAI recently announced that it anticipates "superintelligence" - AI surpassing human abilities - this decade. It is accordingly building a new team, and devoting 20% computing resources to ensurw such AI systems are aligned with human values.
summary: OpenAI recently announced that it anticipates "superintelligence" - AI surpassing human abilities - this decade. It is accordingly building a new team, and devoting 20% computing resources to ensurw such AI systems are aligned with human values.

title: World's Richest Lose $134 Billion In Stock Slump, Led By Jeff Bezos
content: Jeff Bezos's net worth shrank by $15.2 billion on Friday, leading a wide-ranging slump that erased $134 billion from the fortunes of the 500 richest people in the world.
summary: Jeff Bezos's net worth shrank by $15.2 billion on Friday, leading a wide-ranging slump that erased $134 billion from the fortunes of the 500 richest people in the world.

title: 10 Dead, 5 Critical As Residential Building Collapses In Russia
content: The deathcount from the partial collapse of a residential building in the Russian city of Nizhny Tagil has risen to 10, said the Ministry of Emergency Situations.
summary: The deathcount from the partial collapse of a residential building in the Russian city of Nizhny Tagil has risen to 10, said the Ministry of Emergency Situations.

title: "Shocking Scenes": Riots In UK Over Mass Stabbing That Killed Three Girls
content: Rioting erupted Friday evening in Sunderland, northeast England, where police said officers faced "serious and sustained levels of violence", the latest unrest linked to a mass stabbing earlier this week that killed three young girls.
summary: Rioting erupted Friday evening in Sunderland, northeast England, where police said officers faced "serious and sustained levels of violence", the latest unrest linked to a mass stabbing earlier this week that killed three young girls.

title: Iran, Allies Vow Revenge After Top Hamas, Hezbollah Leaders Killed
content: Iran and its regional allies vowed retaliation for the deaths of Hamas and Hezbollah leaders, raising regional tensions as mourners filled Tehran's city centre calling for revenge.
summary: Iran and its regional allies vowed retaliation for the deaths of Hamas and Hezbollah leaders, raising regional tensions as mourners filled Tehran's city centre calling for revenge.

title: Indian In Vietnam Puts An Eel Up His Anus, It Eats Through His Intestines
content: A 31-year-old Indian national was rushed to a hospital in Vietnam's capital Hanoi after experiencing severe abdominal pain due to a live eel he had inserted into his anus, a report said.
summary: A 31-year-old Indian national was rushed to a hospital in Vietnam's capital Hanoi after experiencing severe abdominal pain due to a live eel he had inserted into his anus, a report said.

title: US Scraps Plea Agreement With 9/11 Mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed
content: US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin on Friday scrapped a plea agreement with 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed, just two days after the announcement of a deal that reportedly would have taken the death penalty off the table.
summary: US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin on Friday scrapped a plea agreement with 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed, just two days after the announcement of a deal that reportedly would have taken the death penalty off the table.

title: "Google Close To Shut Down": Donald Trump On Censorship Reports
content: Former US president Donald Trump has lashed out at Google over reports that was censoring news and photos of the Republican presidential candidate.
summary: Former US president Donald Trump has lashed out at Google over reports that was censoring news and photos of the Republican presidential candidate.

title: Massive US Deployment In Middle East After Iran Threatens To Attack Israel
content: The United States will bolster its military presence in the Middle East, deploying additional warships and fighter jets to protect US personnel and defend Israel amid soaring tensions in the region, the Pentagon said Friday.
summary: The United States will bolster its military presence in the Middle East, deploying additional warships and fighter jets to protect US personnel and defend Israel amid soaring tensions in the region, the Pentagon said Friday.

title: 'Zuckerberg Called Me, Said He Won't Support A Democrat': Donald Trump
content: Former US president and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has said that the Facebook founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg recently called him to apologise for censoring him and assured that he would "not support a Democrat".
summary: Former US president and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump has said that the Facebook founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg recently called him to apologise for censoring him and assured that he would "not support a Democrat".

title: Magnitude 6.8 Earthquake Strikes Philippines
content: A 6.8-magnitude earthquake struck off the coast of the southern Philippines early Saturday, the United States Geological Survey said, with no tsunami warning issued.
summary: A 6.8-magnitude earthquake struck off the coast of the southern Philippines early Saturday, the United States Geological Survey said, with no tsunami warning issued.

title: US Secret Service Accepts Responsibility For Failure To Protect Trump
content: The United States Service has owned its failure to protect former president Donald Trump at an election rally in Pennsylvania on July 13.
summary: The United States Service has owned its failure to protect former president Donald Trump at an election rally in Pennsylvania on July 13.
